topic.title: Getting Started with the IHTSDO Workbench IDE

body.section: The IHTSDO Workbench IDE and Viewer are quality assurance tools designed to help users develop standardized terminologies and/or multiple sets of the same terminology. Using the IHTSDO Workbench IDE, vendors can then incorporate standardized terms when developing products and services for clinics, hospitals and other medical organizations. Standardizing the terminology will bring consistency to diagnoses, patient records, insurance claims, etc.
